# sse_service_object (Resource)

Service Object resource

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "sse_service_object" "example" {
  name        = "Terraform Service Object"
  description = "Managed by Terraform"
  protocol    = "tcp"
  ports       = ["80", "443", "8080-8090"]
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String) Service Object Name
- `ports` (List of String) List of ports or port ranges
- `protocol` (String) Protocol (e.g., tcp, udp, icmp)

### Optional

- `description` (String) Service Object Description

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) Service Object ID
